name: Stargate: Undiscovered Universe
description:
Stargate: Undiscovered Universe is a Fan made game set in an alternate reality to the hit sci-fi series. I have used elements from the Minecraft Server this is based off and I part run with another fellow Fan.

Please note that this DEMO is the first part of the game which will be updated as and when possible. I would appreciate any and all feedback but please all I ask is that its kept insult free. I will use all feedback to further develop the game.

I do would all that should you choose to donate towards the development of the game that you do so in kindness and not think that you have to.

Lastly I would like to say that Stargate is an MGM copyrighted series and do not claim to any of the rights to the brand, this is purely fan fiction.

Thanks also to Bysokar (SGMC Minecraft Server Creator, link below), without, this wouldn't be possible
